backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing the core society management backend with types and state for maintenance records, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, users, and notifications, plus role-based access control. The file notes no changes are required for mainnet deployment retry/fallback logic.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report documenting features related to IC mainnet deployment retry tooling and pre-deployment cycles checks, including associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summary file describing the purpose of major frontend source files, pages, hooks, PWA assets, and documentation for quick build and feature overview.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Bash script that wraps `dfx deploy --network ic` with configurable retry attempts, delay, detailed logging, and a pre-deployment cycles/wallet readiness check with clear guidance on failures.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Helper Bash script that pre-creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to avoid CaLM reservation failures before running a standard deployment.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Documentation explaining the IC mainnet deployment helper tools, focusing on retry logic, cycles/wallet readiness checks, CaLM failure handling, and how to use the deployment scripts.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide for IC mainnet deployment covering prerequisites, common errors, and detailed explanation of the automated cycles/wallet readiness checks and manual verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark themes using OKLCH color variables, shared design tokens, and base styles for the entire frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend app with PWA-related meta tags, icons, manifest link, and script loading the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, display mode, orientation, and categories for installable web app behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic offline support by caching core assets, serving cached responses when available, and cleaning up old caches on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root application component, handling authentication, profile loading/setup flow, and conditional rendering before showing the main AppLayout with TanStack Router outlets.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, role-based navigation, notifications, PWA install, and logout logic, wrapping all authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Reusable dashboard card component with icon, title, optional description, actions, and visual variants for status emphasis.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects initial user profile details (name, role, flat number) and saves them via a mutation before allowing app access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook that listens for the PWA install prompt event and exposes install availability and a method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data via an actor, including user profiles, maintenance records, payments, notices, and settings, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens for light/dark themes, base styles, responsive typography, mobile tap targets, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that creates the React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Implements a change-password form that validates input, calls the change password mutation, shows success/error feedback, and logs the user out after success.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Displays the details of a single notice selected by ID, with navigation back to the notices list and optional expiry information.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Lists all notices with sorting, navigation to details, and secretary-only actions for CSV export, printing, and creating new notices.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Displays caller notifications split into unread and read sections, with relative timestamps. Supports marking individual notifications or all notifications as read using mutations and shows loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows detailed information for a single complaint belonging to the caller’s flat, including status, priority, and resolution note. Fetches complaints by flat and handles missing complaint cases.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Allows flat residents to lodge new complaints via a form and view a list of their existing complaints. Integrates complaint creation, status badges, and navigation to complaint details.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Placeholder page for viewing monthly society expenditures. Clearly indicates that the feature is unavailable due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Main dashboard for flat residents showing quick-access cards for maintenance, complaints, notices, visitors, profile, and expenditures. Highlights overdue maintenance payments with an alert.
Enables residents to view maintenance payment status by month/year and record a new payment with UPI reference details. Generates UPI payment links and displays paid or pending status badges.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows residents to manage up to four mobile numbers associated with their flat for visitor approvals. Fetches, edits, validates, and saves mobile numbers via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Flat resident page that lists visitor entry requests for the user’s flat, showing status and allowing pending requests to be approved or declined with API mutations and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Guard dashboard overview showing counts of pending visitor requests and navigation cards to view requests, create a new request, or view notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form page for guards to create a new visitor request, select flat and contact number, submit it via API, and open a prefilled WhatsApp message for approval.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Detail view for a single visitor request, displaying visitor info, flat, contact number, and current status with navigation back to the requests list.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: List page for guards showing all visitor requests sorted by newest, with status badges, WhatsApp sender info, and navigation to create or view request details.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity, handles login errors, and presents a branded UI for society access.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Secretary admin page for managing complaints, showing summary counts, a table of all complaints, and actions to export data as CSV or open a print view.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Printable report page that loads all complaints, displays summary statistics and a table, and automatically triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form page for secretaries to create and submit a new notice with title, message, and optional expiry date, using a mutation hook and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Admin interface to record, edit, and view monthly expenditures, including itemized entries, notes, CSV export, and print functionality.
Print-optimized page that fetches and displays a monthly expenditure report with totals and notes, automatically triggering the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Print-only report page that lists all notices in descending order with title, message, and expiry date, and auto-triggers printing once loaded.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Page to view flats with overdue maintenance payments for a selected month and year, including alerts based on the current overdue period.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Management page for reviewing monthly maintenance payment records, with filters by month/year and options to export CSV or print reports.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Print-friendly payment report showing paid and unpaid flats for a selected period, including summary counts and automatic print triggering.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Secretary dashboard page rendering navigation cards for payments, overdue flats, expenditures, complaints, notices, and settings, with conditional overdue status based on date and fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: Settings page allowing the secretary to view and update the society UPI ID and WhatsApp number using query hooks, form inputs, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility functions to generate CSV strings from data, properly escape fields, and trigger client-side CSV file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date utility helpers for getting the current month/year, formatting bigint timestamps into readable dates, and generating month and year ranges.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Helpers to determine whether the current date is in the overdue period and whether an overdue notice should be shown based on payment status.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Simple utilities to open a print-friendly route in a new tab and trigger the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds a UPI payment deep link URL with predefined payee name, amount, currency, and note.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored parameters across navigation.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp deep link URL by normalizing a mobile number and encoding a preset message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens via CSS variables, animations, container settings, and registered plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing the project’s current state, versioning, and a detailed list of implemented features for the Vision Galaxy Society ICP application.
